name: Catalyst [WIP]
description:
Catalyst

A crudely made, unfinished abstract neutral coloured game. It features [MC] who will eventually find themselves searching for an escape, while maintaining the life within their Catalyst (blue flower).

- Note From Dev -

I'm relatively new to game development in unity, however I aim to grow on this project and eventually make something people will want to play... I've already had a ton of fun working on this, and I can't wait to see where it will go from here.

Music producer: DodgerAF
